content.raw:
We have released a new version of `srcsim` (0.2.0~1) that includes the patch that fixes this issue. Note that you'll have to manually install the `ros-indigo-stereo-image-proc` dependency. The patch includes the modification that opens the door in ~1 second. We don't plan any other important change for the quals.

@rmerriam , could you please verify the patch?
